cause.description:
please donate to help stop green house gases from destroying our world. Some examples are
1.Turn off the lights in a room if you aren't using it
2.Try to use the bus more often or ride a bike and if you really need to use the car use hybrid cars or anything else that wont cause green-house gases
3.Try using more energy efficient light bulbs
1. Green-House gases must be stoped
cause.mission: stop the green-house gases from destroying our world
cause.name: stop green-house gases!
